title.rendered: The Orange Days arrive at PcComponentes with a festival of offers

content.rendered:
In addition, to make things as simple as possible for you, we have ordered all the offers that we have selected for you from lowest to highest price, so that you can choose the product that best suits your needs and interests.

Corsair Saber Pro Champion Series

We are going to start this compilation with a gaming mouse that will make you fall in love. We are talking about the Corsair Saber Pro Champion Series, a wired model that boasts a Ergonomic design to offer a great grip and allow quick movements, thanks in part to its weight of 69 grams.

Its buttons feature a spring-loaded design for faster clicks than ever, plus a Paracord cable that reduces drag on movements. Lastly, your 18,000 DPI optical sensor native will more than meet the expectations of the most demanding users.

Lenovo R1 Smartwatch

Smart watches have become one of the best accessories for our mobile phone. And if you want buy a cheap smartwatchTake advantage of this offer for the PcComponentes Orange Days to get the Lenovo R1 Smartwatch at the best price.

We are talking about a smart watch that boasts a 1.3 inch screen so you don’t lose detail of the notifications you receive. In addition, it includes 3 interchangeable bezels and 2 different straps so you can give it a personal touch.

How could it be otherwise in a proper smartwatch, the Lenovo R1 boasts all kinds of sensors to monitor every last step you take, including a pedometer, a heart rate sensor, and sleep monitoring and stress levels.

It has 7 different sport modes, a dedicated app to monitor your workouts and water resistance up to 3 ATM so you can use it for training. It even tracks your activity while you swim!

Segway Ninebot eKickscooter Zing C8

Thousands of children are going to celebrate communion shortly, so you can take advantage of the PcComponentes Orange Days to surprise your son with a gift unique: a Segway Ninebot eKickscooter Zing C8 so you can have fun like never before.

Designed for children up to 12 years, and a height of up to 145 cm, it has three driving modes (safe, turbo or cruise) so you can choose the one you like best. In addition, it reaches up to 16 km/h, and has a range of up to 10 km so you can have a good time of fun.

Finally, its IPX4 water resistance will give you the peace of mind that splashes will not be a problem for this offer electric scooter for the Orange Days of PcComponentes.

LG 65NANO816PA

We close this compilation with the best offers that you will find in PcComponentes with one of the great bargains. More than anything because you are going to be able buy a 65-inch LG 4K Smart TV for 679 euros.

A discount of 26.91% so you can enjoy a large-format television at a moderate price. And seeing the characteristics of this LG NanoCell TV, it is one of those bargains that you should not miss.

To start with, your minimalist design It will allow you to hang it on the wall or place it on a piece of furniture without any problem, since it is really thin. In addition, the Nano technology that integrates its panel eliminates the impurities of the RGB wavelengths so that you see purer and more accurate colors.

To say that this 4K Smart TV on offer at PcComponentes for the Orange Days has the best technologies on the market so you can enjoy watching movies or series like never before. To do this, it has Dolby Vision supportthe most widely used HDR standard in the industry and that you will find in many content available on platforms such as Netflix, HBO Max or Disney + to give an example.

The icing on the cake is its support for FilmmakerMode, a standard that disables motion interpolation while preserving the original aspect ratios, colors, and frame rates. With this, Smart TVs are prevented from doing image post-processing, with the aim that the film is seen accurately and following the director’s vision. It will be like going to the cinema!

Other offers not to be missed

Finally, we leave you with a list of other products on offer that we recommend so that you can make the most of the PcComponentes Orange Days
